q: Press If any NFL teams are interested in Michael Vick , they're not saying. One day after the former Atlanta Falcons quarterback was conditionally reinstated to the league, only the Baltimore Ravens would directly acknowledge evaluating him. We've had long discussions about Michael Vick , and we have a feeling about how he would impact our team and not impact our team, Ravens coach John Harbaugh said Tuesday. Ravens general manager Ozzie Newsome declined comment. Previously, he has said the team has enough quarterbacks. More on Michael Vick 's skills are too hard to ignore, Bucky Brooks writes, and it
